unnormalised: Arrey yaar, pesticide usage is a huge issue in agriculture, especially in places like Punjab! I remember my grandfather used so much back in '80s. It affected the soil badly near our village, Rampur. We need better solutions, like the IARI is working on. Maybe organic farming? 10/10/2024 seems like a good deadline to implement more sustainable options. Thinking about that chole bhature from the market at 13:00 hrs. Any thoughts? Costs must be kept low as well, farmers can't afford Rs. 5000/acre for expensive alternatives. 01/01/2025?
normalised: Arrey yaar, pesticide usage is a huge issue in agriculture, especially in places like Punjab! I remember my grandfather used so much back in eighties. It affected the soil badly near our village, Rampur. We need better solutions, like the I-A-R-I is working on. Maybe organic farming? tenth october two thousand and twenty four seems like a good deadline to implement more sustainable options. Thinking about that chole bhature from the market at one three zero zero hours. Any thoughts? Costs must be kept low as well, farmers can't afford rupee five thousand per acre for expensive alternatives. first january two thousand and twenty five?
